description: Introducing the 2025 Louisville Slugger Savannah Bananas Drop 10 USA Baseball Bat, a perfect blend of vibrant style and top-notch performance. Featuring a balanced swing feel and a one-piece composite design, this bat is engineered to enhance your game with its optimal length-to-weight ratio. The 2 5/8 inch barrel diameter maximizes the sweet spot, while the HUB1 End Cap ensures a lighter swing feel through the zone, making it ideal for young players seeking speed and control. Certified for USA Baseball, this bat's eye-catching yellow, blue, and green colorway is sure to stand out on the field.
